full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA BSRUNG GI GTZO 'KHOR RNAMS LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA GSER GYI GA-YANG ZHUN BZHUGS SO, ,
